summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019, documenting a social phone call made by inmate Jeffrey Epstein on August 9, 2019. The memo details the logistics of the call, including that Epstein called his mother, and notes the call was ended after 15 minutes.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who was allowed to make a social phone call to his mother on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Social Phone Call
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was escorted to make a social phone call from the Special Housing Unit shower area. He called his mother, and the call was terminated after 15 minutes.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a prison memorandum dated August 10, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
On August 9, 2019, Epstein was allowed to make a social phone call, which he stated was to his mother.
The call was made from a phone jack in the shower area of the Special Housing Unit's G Tier and was ended after 15 minutes.
Epinson's inmate registration number is noted as 76315-054 (with a typo also showing 76318-054).
The memorandum is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY document set (SDNY_00009353).
